name: Exposure (USD)
query:
select 
    so.name as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
	so.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
	so.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
	so.currency as "CCY:Link/Currency:50",
	(so.grand_total-(so.advance_paid/so.conversion_rate)) as "Total Amount:Float:100",
	so.conversion_rate as "Rate:Float:80",
	so.base_grand_total as "INR Amount:Currency:100",
	so.forward_contract as "Forward:Link/Forward Booking:80",
	so.amount_covered as "Amount Hedged:Float:100",
	so.amount_unhedged as "Unhedged Amount:Float:100",
	so.natural_hedge as "Natural Hedge::80",
	so.delivery_date as "Delivery Date:Date:100",
	so.status as "Status::200"
from	
	`tabSales Order` so
where
	so.docstatus = 1
        and so.currency = 'USD'
        and so.status != 'Closed'
	and so.status != 'Completed'
	and so.amount_covered < so.grand_total
order by so.delivery_date asc
